item.title: Shortcode - List files
item.description: Maybe you don’t need to visualize files. You just display a list of links (like an Apache2 server). Use a shortcode like the gallery template. Snippet: { {< list-files folder="files" >} } In order to display the shortcode above, additional spacing was necessary. The real shortcode should have braces without a middle space, like {{ and }}. (Note: This won’t work with Markdown files because they’re processed by Hugo.)

item.title: Shortcode - Photo gallery
item.description: Photoswipe provides image gallery functionality. A version is archived in this repository/theme for offline use. Images will be displayed in a nested layout. Click one to expand it and show at full resolution. Snippet: { {< gallery folder="public-domain" >} } # or { {< gallery folder="public-domain" title="Name of header">} } Note: In order for Hugo to display the shortcode above without rendering it, additional spacing was necessary. The real shortcode should have braces without a middle space, like {{ and }}, with their respective <> characters.
